title: Keycloak 21.1.0 released
content: To download the release go to .   MIGRATION FROM 21.0  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database. If you are not on the previous release refer to for a complete list of migration changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   BUGS   * SAML2 Client Signing Keys Config does not accept PEM import keycloak admin/ui  * ClientPolicies: Deserialization of `MultivaluedString ` config property    doesn't work properly between new admin-ui and backend keycloak admin/ui  * Trusted Hosts configuration in Client Registration Policy not working    keycloak admin/ui  * When editing JS policy, the text area with "Code" should be read-only    keycloak admin/ui  * UI glitches in Users - Groups - Join Group keycloak admin/ui  * Declarative user profile attribute options validator is not added correctly    keycloak admin/ui  * Sessions displayed multiple times keycloak admin/ui  * Installation of keycloak-js fails with npm and yarn keycloak    adapter/javascript  * Documentation doesn't have versions set properly keycloak docs  * `.\kc.bat start-dev` on Windows failed to start in 21.1.0 keycloak    dist/quarkus  * Upgrade from 21.0.2 to 21.1.0 fails on oracle db keycloak storage  * Keycloak Quarkus Server dependency broken keycloak dependencies  * Not possible to override default or built-in providers keycloak core  * Validators not saved when creating new User profile -> Attribute keycloak    admin/ui   UPGRADING  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database and check the for anything that may have changed.
